lead_paragraph: DRAZEN--Ruth. We note with sorrow the passing of our member, Ruth Drazen, and extend sincerest condolences to her bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl, President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
